Articles.Content: I created this account a long time ago, just never did anything with it. Kinda forgot I had an account. Been lurking around the forum since I started playing KSP, around 0.18. Finally decided I better login and participate in this amazing community. I have a KSP writing project in the works, and hopefully I'll be able to post what I have.

I had this account since September. Not as long as you, but I really got involved in the fourms in January. Welcome to the fourms!

Edited February 14, 2017 by munlander1
Spell check
Thanks! Yeah I just got back into KSP here recently, when I last played it was 1.0.5, its kinda fun to come back and discover all the new changes, especially the mods.
